website_summaries.verdict: The majority of the buyers claimed that the Asics Gel Scram 4 was, overall, a decent upgrade. The shoe delivered a firm structure, a supportive platform, and a comfortable fit, all of which made users feel they were wearing a top-of-the-line running shoe. The satisfaction of consumers is clear evidence that the Gel Scram 4 was a good buy.
pros: The outsole of the Gel Scram 4 provided excellent grip on the trails, according to a commenter
The shoe did outstandingly on steep, technical surfaces, as experienced by a buyer
The Gel Scram 4 gave a long-lasting comfort, some wearers mentioned
One reviewer wrote that there was “great workmanship in the design” of the shoe
Many users shared they had bought more pairs because of how satisfied they were with the shoe’s performance
The subtle colorways available were appreciated by the customers
The Gel Scram 4 was surprisingly lightweight, considering it was a trail shoe, a commenter remarked
A reviewer stated that the shoe felt firmer and more stable compared to other trail runners
cons: The fit was still too small even with the Extra Wide option, a buyer complained
One user was upset that the outsole came apart after only two days

customer_reviews.title: These shoes look great, but lack the comfort of older models that ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m in Afghanistan with the military and run daily. These shoes look great, but lack the comfort of older models that I’ve come to love with ASICS. I was disappointed with the shoe overall.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love these shoes. It’s my second pair, one for running and the other for work. I’m a ER nurse and I can confirm these do very well for walking and standing 12-14 hours a day. I have super wide feet so I’m limited to what shoes I wear, these are awesome! The only negative is, and this is just my opinion, that they have mesh tops, so fluids you don’t want to get through your shoes will do so. Other than that, they’re great for running, walking, standing, and super light and comfy all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This pair of shoes is not what is advertised. They say it is gel. It is not. It is made to look like gel. They are very hard on the feet. The shoe feels like you have blocks of wood on your feet. I usually wear size 8 but go to size 9 in ASICS. These size 9’s are way smaller. They are very narrow and short. I would put them at a 7. They appear to be cheap Asian knock-offs sold at thrift stores. The bad thing is , I wear Asics all the time. I usually love the shoes. Not. This. Time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nickel

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe, delivery time, and ASICS fan since being a USMC vet!! Semper Fi!!
customer_reviews.author: pan3272

customer_reviews.title: Greay shoe, comfy, but slight fabric seperation
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is comfortable, even without my orthotics, and they look great, but the outer webbing/structure (separate from the actually weaving of the shoe itself) arrived separated from the shoe on the left foot and several other portions on the left followed suit. The shoe is a bit snug on the top of my foot but it’s stretching/breaking in as a weat them. And I’ve had many asics shoes and 10.5 have always fit well. That all being said... I would probably buy again
customer_reviews.author: M13

customer_reviews.title: ASICS don't disappoint, ever!
customer_reviews.text: they're ASICS. that's all I gotta say, really. I've been buying ASICS for 10+ years, the low price and high quality are hard to beat. I wear them daily for work, standing on concrete floors and I replace the shoes once a year. I didn't need to try these on, to know they fit and are comfortable. I laced them up and went to work. in other words, buy them, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: The Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought no running shoes other than ASICS for at least 30 years. I no longer run marathons, but I still wear ASICS for walking and casual wear. These are well-cushioned and accommodate my very wide foot comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShoppers

customer_reviews.title: 4th time is not the charm. Total Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned every version of the Scram. 4 Is by far the worst. The insoles are NOT REMOVEABLE! They are just flat foam pads that do not contour when they meet the edge of the shoe. The material on the toe has started delaminating after very moderate wear. Not sure why they have a mesh toe, because they are not breathable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Asics makes the best shoes for my feet. I am 6'2", 250 with size 13 that are too narrow for a wide shoe, but too wide for a normal shoe. I also have high arches. Asics just seem to fill the void, being stylish at the same time, and at a great price. My only complaint about Asics is that the wear and tear that happens on them is too quick. The design is fantastic, but the product material/quality could be elevated. The backs of the shoes on the inside fray and rip apart way too quickly than they should. Overall though, I haven't worn anything but Asics in the last 5 years, so I have to give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ElCubanaso

customer_reviews.title: Give them a chance to loosen up.
customer_reviews.text: I was close to sending these back. Out of the box, these were very uncomfortable. My toes were going numb while driving my car. Loosened the laces and helped a little. Over a couple weeks, they have become more comfortable and have loosened up quite a bit. Just give them time, they do end up being pretty decent outdoor shoes. This is my first pair of Asics, so I'm used to the out of box comfortness that comes with Nike. I hope these last as long as my Nikes did.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great medium duty trail shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Broke them in with a 20K trail run. No issues what so ever! Great support, fit my wide foot perfectly, not as aggressive a tread as I would have liked but still good grip. Light weight too!
customer_reviews.author: sjaz556

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a fashion purchase for me. I can't really comment on the running or gym use aspect these were intended for since I just wear them casually at work & weekends. They are comfortable and true to size. I purchased a size 9 which I wear in Nike, Adidas, and New Balance. I have a regular width, my foot is not very narrow or wide I hope this helps anyone interested in this shoe. The black with camo has a great look to it and the price is just right - go for it!
customer_reviews.author: R. GUTIERREZ

customer_reviews.title: ASICS for the win
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing ASICS for more than a decade. I love the light weight combined with consistently excellent workmanship. Unfortunately, I don’t always get that from Nike. Depending on which factory they contract with anywhere in the world, Nike’s can be great or grating! These are for our daughter. When it comes to shoes she has great taste but is notoriously difficult to shop for. She likes the wider width of men’s athletic shoes and these eye-catchers brought a smile to her face, and a fast run out the door!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised!  A rare treat!
customer_reviews.text: I have had problems with many shoes ordered over Amazon. Not this time! Perfect fit, no hassle, no returns and just that in itself should be enough considering what I have been through in the past. If that's not enough, this is the most comfortable shoe I have ever put on out of the box. More Importantly; I have had these shoes for about six weeks now. Asics rocks! I am now a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Dezmo

customer_reviews.title: I bought for the design
customer_reviews.text: My running days are over but I still browse Amazon for discounted Asics. I'm a fan of the Contend-4 and bought the same size in this Scram 4 and these seem just a bit larger. No doubt it's the model of the shoe but I typically wear a 12 wide and could easily go with an 11.5 or 11 in this Scram 4. But like I said, I bought these for the unique design and the camo is low-key enough to not be too busy on top.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Nice Walking Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes - they take the shock out of walking for exercise. I have had about five pairs of these Asics, and they are all good, the shoe will wear out but not show it when after many miles they are not as firm. So you will need to replace them after about a year of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. I like that ASICS always fit true to size. In the past I used to buy a lot of Nike and Vans brand shoes but the quality started to go downhill. So much so that Nike shoes seem to acquire a permanent squeak if they get wet one time. Vans I had to start buying size 12 or 11...it varied so much. I normally wear size 11.5 and have since I was about 17 yers old. ASICS always seem to fit me right.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Ridge Blues

customer_reviews.title: fits 4E feet
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear NB for years until they took everything but one shoe offshore. The offshore 4E last isn't even close. Tried 4 different models. Gave these a try and as reported, the fit a 4E great if you get the "extra wide". Only issue is zero arch support and no cushioning in the stock insole. I got a set of Dr. Schol insoles and solved that.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hard Surfaces!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my boyfriend who works in a warehouse on concrete and walks several miles every shift. He said they were the BEST shoes he's ever worn. They reduce is foot pain at the end of the shift with their great support. He feels like his foot is lighter and cushioned well. I highly recommend these for anyone that spends hours working on hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: dstomli

customer_reviews.title: Sole fell apart after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Liked the shoe initially, bought them for my boyfriend in Oct 2018 for his bday and he has worn them sparingly, (they still look brand new) and I just found one in the garage the other day (2/25/19) with a clamp on the sole b/c he had to Gorilla Glue the sole back on. So a little less impressed with them now.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Auxter

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoe - camo is attractive and goes with jeans nicely. Stitching is top notch. It is unfortunate this shoes was not made in an extra wide width (4E). I must ask, why not? I have other friends who would have purchased this shoe but for that fact. Asics does not offer all of their shoes in 4E width apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Share-A-Smile

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a pair of these, as I've had several Scram 2's in the past. Did not like the way these felt however, a little "harder" insoles compared to my other shoes, so returned them. Fit was good, just not comfy enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rob W

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last
customer_reviews.text: Got about 4 months out of these wearing them to work (standing / walking). Started to break down, and lose tread pretty quickly. Moved to a set of GT 1000s and they are going strong after 4 months. Take a pass on these shoes, they look great, but they do not last at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P

customer_reviews.title: High quality, good product..
customer_reviews.text: High quality, good product.. Worth the money!! Would recommend and will buy again. These are true to American sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond E Short

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with wider feet.
customer_reviews.text: Narrower than most Asics I've owned but still a wider shoe than anyone else is making. Really well made.
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These give asics a bad name.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work. I walk a lot and stand on concrete. I've heard asics were good shoes with decent arch support and very comfortable. I wore these for 5 days and by the end of the week I could barely walk after getting out of bed. These are the most uncomfortable shoes I've ever had. I should have known that a decent pair of shoes for $40 was too good to be true. I'll assume that asics still make good shoes but this type is trash. I ended up getting some Hoka's and they feel like magic on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Comfort with value
customer_reviews.text: Can go wrong with these, feel the cushion as soon as you put them on. Looking forward to the run, always liked ASICS Gel as they hold true to the name. I'm not a long distance runner/jogger, typically do 3 miles, so this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: I don't really run but these shoes are so comfortable I got a pair from my brother a couple years.. ever since those asics I've been hooked , These shoes are comfortable light weight, good for everyday use running walking whatever you need them for..
customer_reviews.author: James in real life

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for the wide footed runner!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these wider width ASICS I’ve purchased. Been very happy with the fit and width. Not all shoes I’d like to tryout (replace runners quarterly) come in the wider sizes but these are just fine for my treadmill trips and the 5/10ks I enjoy doing.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the previous versions shame on you ASICS
customer_reviews.text: Here’s the deal I have been wearing ASICS scram series for 3 + years and every series has had really good arch support the 4th series has none at all how can you drastically change that in the same series shoe.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but laces are short
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy with the shoes. My only complaint is that the laces are so short you can barely tie them. You'll have to either change the laces, or thread them differently which there are tons of videos that will provide excellent options.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, good traction, maybe durable as well
customer_reviews.text: I wore Gel-Scram 3s until they fell apart. I added some Spenco insoles and they were very comfortable. The new model has non-removable insoles. I may try putting the Spenco insoles on top of them to give me a bit more cushioning. Otherwise it seems like as solid a shoe as its predecessor.
customer_reviews.author: J. Queirolo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! Fit is very good! They actually look better than the picture. They're made well and are very durable. The arch support is very good. They are light and very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Justin P. Whan

customer_reviews.title: NOT ORTHOPEDIC APPROVED.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was supposed to be very stiff. IT WAS NOT!. I was very disappointed. I didnt even put it on. There was no point. If the shoe bends in the arch it is no good and that is exactly what happened. I would not tell anyone to but these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: jamie voss

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my brother, he was very specific about them having to be Asics. He loved them, we picked out a darker pair because he lives in a busy city in Mexico, where he walks a few miles every morning as a workout. Need to cover dirt. Good choice
customer_reviews.author: Barrera07

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I bought them for trails and hiking so I didn’t mind when they started falling apart after the third day. If you’re buying them for looks, use them tenderly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ive had 3 pairs of the scram shoes. Good fit. Lightweight. Comfortable and put up with my workouts and daily use for a year or so. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit ASICS product
customer_reviews.text: I would NOT recommend this shoe from this vendor...as it is counterfeit!! I have owned ASICS for my last 15 pairs of shoes and just tried this Scram variation?! And Nothing seems correct about it; from the box, to the glued in insoles (never have they been glued before, to the lack of support and sub-standard fit. VERY disappointed with this “ASICS” product. All in all you are better off going to your local Authorized ASICS dealer to purchase a “real” product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Knauff

customer_reviews.title: Great fit - true to size. Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband. Loved the fit and comfort. True to size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you actually plan to run don’t buy these!
customer_reviews.text: This is like a garbage facsimile of ASICS. It’s hard to believe these are really ASICS. The heel doesn’t have the plastic cup in the back like other pairs I’ve had. The foot feels like I bought a generic shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at a good price
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of this shoe. The 1st one lasted 4 years. I am wearing the 2nd pair as I write. Very stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Presnell

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this shoe years ago and I like them. This is my third pair. Would recommend them. They fit well and feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Roger L. Meneely

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe. Nice fit is perfect for running or walking. Also has a very comfortable foot bed. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: 04rk88

customer_reviews.title: Skip these
customer_reviews.text: These look awsome the first day you get them but if your buying them because they are camo dont bother the camo parts started to peel by day 2 of owning and wearing them...really frustrating..
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good for feet
customer_reviews.text: Gels are great shoes. They have been a standard for years. If you have ever been around volleyball, you know Asics.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Ware

customer_reviews.title: ASICS good as ever.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for more of a dedicated running shoe. They seemed tight and I was worried my feet would hurt. After just a day of walking around they loosened up a bit and fit perfect. More support than my Gel Venture 5 ( which I now wear as my daily shoe.) I’m happy with the purchase. ASICS make my feet feel great as always.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Asics does not have quailty control anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Tread finishing was random. A complete mess. Got to keep drugs out of the factory. Somebody just ran a paint brush over the tread.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tenny shoes
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I shopped are stores looking for shoes for my husband, couldn't find what I liked. I went on Amazon and found these within 10 minutes. Perfect fit, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: cecilia

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I love these runners, good shoe, it's my 3rd pr. Basically a good shoe to walk around in and light running..
customer_reviews.author: andrew j harris

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband that was in the military he liked the camo and they are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne DeCamillo

customer_reviews.title: Well padded and comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe for walking on concrete and pavement. Good support and padding. Cool and light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes look good and feel just as good. Have done some workouts in them and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: T Rod 70

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a real Asics product, but beware of knockoffs
customer_reviews.text: Bought some blue ones a couple months later and they same to be cheap knock-offs. Caveat emptor.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesarr

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: The width, arch support is what I was looking for. Fits well. Excellent shoe for jogging.
customer_reviews.author: Harry A. Romney

customer_reviews.title: "Trail running support"
customer_reviews.text: Asics Gel-Scram Running Shoe was highly rated as a trail shoe.I bought them,fit nicely,supportive.Now I am running local trails. :)
customer_reviews.author: Chewbaca

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes, the price is right and they look great and wear well too!
customer_reviews.author: H M S

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable shoes! Wear them all day and still be comfortable. The camo looks very cool.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: I Would Definitely Buy Them Again
customer_reviews.text: I walk between 5 and 10 miles a day and ASICS fit well, they look great and fall in my price range but they tend not to last as long as I would hope. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: chance salopek

customer_reviews.title: like em like em a lot
customer_reviews.text: good fit, comfortable mu friends are all asking me where I got my camp tennis shoes
customer_reviews.author: PAZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, great price and great delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoe, great price and great delivery . This is probably my eight pair .Will continue to buy as needed .
customer_reviews.author: Roman M

customer_reviews.title: good value and style
customer_reviews.text: was price $20 below the other color-combinations. Nice fit nice find.
customer_reviews.author: ben there

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and style. They arrived quickly and I couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great trekking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love ASICS! First time using this style of ASICS and I love it. Great trekking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Asics work well for the price
customer_reviews.text: My old Asics were worn out and I needed a new pair. They work best for me if I replace the stock soles with gel soles. Delivery was quick and arrived in time for work use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers cause not only are they Camouflage, but they’re very comfortable! Not to mention, they’re one of the only sneaker manufacturers that are actually producing a camo sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: LineKilla

customer_reviews.title: Very good for hiking or walking on hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes I took them to costa rica and they still work, definitely I could buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: fernando flores

customer_reviews.title: Functionality
customer_reviews.text: I love Asics product, but this shoe did not have enough Arch.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe with no arch support
customer_reviews.text: ASICS are my favorite because they usually have excellent arch support. Compared them to two of my old pairs of ASICS and the footbed is completely different. These have virtually no arch so sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Corbett M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The stitching on one shoe is off so the fabric is not connected, compromising the integrity of the shoe itself.
customer_reviews.author: Palmer C.

customer_reviews.title: A little bit disappointed about the support I need for hiking.
customer_reviews.text: Since the support is not as much as I need for hiking I will use them for walking shoes. Great shoes though.
customer_reviews.author: robert w walters

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I’ve been wearing ASICS since the mid 80’s. I recommend not only these, but any ASICS athletic shoe to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tormoen

customer_reviews.title: Wore out faster than usual
customer_reviews.text: fit well, but the inside of the heel wore out a lot faster than my other shoes do and made a hole on the inside of the heel. Didn't wear it more than usual either.
customer_reviews.author: Quality4Lesss

customer_reviews.title: Not as cushy as expected, but great shoe otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: My son says they are not as cushy as other "gel" shoes he's worn. Otherwise, they are comfortable with good year and he likes the look of them.
customer_reviews.author: AWall

customer_reviews.title: nice light shoe with extra wide purchase option
customer_reviews.text: Extra wide toe box is helpful. Most regular shoes are too tight on my feet and didn't realize it until trying the extra wide option.
customer_reviews.author: GREG LANDIS

customer_reviews.title: The price is fair
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes they could be a little more comfy but they work really well
customer_reviews.author: Keegan Haertling

customer_reviews.title: Great Asics!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Fits and runs great, but some of fabric on toes came unglued. Only reason did not get 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: robert klingaman

customer_reviews.title: Great running sneaker
customer_reviews.text: My husband runs cross country, through wooded trails , on roads etc Comfortable with good support
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee F

customer_reviews.title: So nice, I bought them twice.
customer_reviews.text: You can't find shoes this good at this price point very often. I've purchased multiple pair.
customer_reviews.author: FriendofaFriend

customer_reviews.title: Widely recommended for heavy walking work.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, I work 12 hours shift most if the time walking around tools and computers they are Very fresh and ventiled. I will buy a second and third to start replacing my present working shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price,fit
customer_reviews.text: Look great haven't been able to get out and wear em yet though
customer_reviews.author: Greg Carney

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe, slightly narrower than expected
customer_reviews.text: Fits good, somewhat narrower than expected. Only time will tell on the general quality but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review after few months of usage of my ASICS shoes. It’s best shoe for running. Shoes are light and soft. Worth Buying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, correct fit to size
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, looks cool, feels good. Fits to size as all of my Asics have.
customer_reviews.author: tim k.

customer_reviews.title: Great trail running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit in toe box and on arch. Lightweight but has a great outdoor/trails sole.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Jordan / Jordan Innovations

customer_reviews.title: Shoes is light.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for work because I walk a lot and it feels so good on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: senour padayao

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't show dirt!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I feel like no one else has these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ngam

customer_reviews.title: Great supportive shoe, with a eye catching design.
customer_reviews.text: A great supportive shoe for casual wear, also for someone who might have problem feet and needs a shoe that is going to last.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, great brand new quality. I only wear ASIC shoes for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Dopest shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect fit! Exactly what I expected but not my first choice of color. Don’t doddle on ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, high quality and fits my husband well who has a size 14.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C. Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: High quality shoe. Inside shaped like the human foot (a good thing). Runs a little small. If you are between sizes like I am take the larger before walking around the city for a day.
customer_reviews.author: eh-ch

customer_reviews.title: No arch support.
customer_reviews.text: My gel scram 2 had great arch support but thesr have none.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My second pair!
customer_reviews.text: My second pair. I love these shoes. From moderate running (10-12 miles per week) to wearing around town. So comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nickzu

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes but wrong classification I would call them casual
customer_reviews.text: No arch support, kind of hurt my feet, I added arch support and they seem good now I like the look
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lebhaft

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe for walking that I've found.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this make of shoe and I love them. I hope they don't discontinue the Gel Scram 4 series.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Fake sneakers
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker is not original omg I'm very disappointed with this purchase. If you compare to my old same brand sneakers not even close, tip fake from God know were . What shame Amazon
customer_reviews.author: celio(C)

customer_reviews.title: cushioning
customer_reviews.text: great cushioning I can walk on hard surfaces all day
customer_reviews.author: jim copeland

customer_reviews.title: Great trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. I have been hiking all over the Colorado Rockies and this shoe is sturdy and offers great grip on the trails
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased and sure that I'd made good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel ponce

customer_reviews.title: Narrow and hard
customer_reviews.text: Way too narrow and hard as a rock. I don’t know how anyone could run in these. Sent them back
customer_reviews.author: Sean Walsh

product_meta.title: ASICS - Mens Gel-Scram 4 Shoes
product_meta.description: Combining rugged design with adventurous performance, GEL-SCRAM 4 trail performance footwear for men hangs tough on any trail. Its aggressive trail-specific outsole improves traction on uphill and downhill slopes, so you can trek with confidence on all types of terrain. To protect from harsh impact, the Rearfoot GEL technology absorbs shock with each movement, while the reinforced toe cap adds an extra layer of durability. Lightweight yet sturdy, the GEL-SCRAM 4 shoe features a breathable mesh upper and EVA sockliner for maximum comfort, ensuring a perfect fit to enhance your running performance. " . Weight: 10.09.
feature_bullets: Rearfoot GEL technology cushioning system - Attenuates shock during impact phase and allows for a smooth transition to midstance.
Trail Specific Outsole - Reversed lugs provide uphill and downhill traction on all types of terrain.
Synthetic Leather and Mesh Upper - Lightweight, comfortable and breathable, enhancing performance and fit.
